response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that holds significant worth to me. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial. For this exceptional product, I am offering it to you at a special price of $9,500. This price reflects a fair assessment of its value while allowing you to enjoy considerable savings compared to its market value. I trust that you will find this proposal attractive and look forward to discussing further details with you. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding.", "product_price": 9500}
